column4: can someone help me configure access permissions on postgresql
i just setup postgresql on ubuntu over the weekend... http://bioinformaticsonline.co.uk/2007/02/26/postgresql_on_ubuntu_linux_how_to is a good guide
just be warned though, if running headless and using phppgadmin, the port is wrong...
ubuntu pushes it up one to 5433 instead of 5432
